summary: A moderate yet great player home
descriptionHtml:
Dovahkiin Riverwood View is a home located at riverwood (see screenshots)

it has 5 different areas

1) Weapon display room
2) Bedroom
3) Walk-in-pantry
4) Vault
5) Outdoor smiting area
<br /><br /><br />
<br /><br /><br />I don`t to give to much information, i find it better to find out for yourself, so a small description on each area

The bedroom has numerous weapon plaques, racks and cases and some various storage containers, under the bed there is a trapdoor that leads into the vault

The pantry has a trapdoor under the stairs and it contains barrels and sacks for every food item and beverage

The vault is for of course your valuables

The weapons room has lots of plaques and and a nice few display cases and racks

The smiting area has everything you would want, including chests for weapons and armor/items to smelt and others to keep after smiting, among other things in the smiting area

as far as i know it should not conflict with anything, if it does, please let me know
author: Buddy1011
